title: I used to think its not jgs job to carry a lane
body: but a ranged carry harassing melee tank under their own turret denying mad farm, thats just not fair.

replies.body: Gonna have to down vote that. Sorry dude click bait is not a good topic
And that situation does nothing to change that.

In that situation the best thing to do is to end the lane phase as quickly as possible.  You got counterpicked hard and cannot contest your lane, and so you have to start the team phase.  This requires your team to work together and not simply extend the lane phase while abandoning your lost lane.

Basically you have to treat the lane as already lost, and play like that before you've also lost your laner to a massive farm disadvantage.
